output.sentences: The pitcher was wild that day when he first hit someone trying to steal a base.
The crowd was so angry that even the cotton candy vendor stopped what he was doing to check out the game.
Once more the pitcher wound up.
Then he hurled the ball right at another runner.
He went on to finish the inning but the crowd was furious with him.
